unnormalised: Guys, get ready! The auto market is heating up with a flurry of new vehicle launches!
normalised: Guys, get ready! The auto market is heating up with a flurry of new vehicle launches!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra unveiled its all-new "Scorpio N Adventure Edition" near Leh, promising off-roading thrills in the Himalayas. Expect rugged features and a price tag that'll make your wallet weep... but in a good way, maybe?
normalised: First up, Mahindra unveiled its all-new "Scorpio N Adventure Edition" near Leh, promising off-roading thrills in the Himalayas. Expect rugged features and a price tag that will make your wallet weep... but in a good way, maybe?

unnormalised: Then, Maruti Suzuki finally launched the much-awaited "Jimny XL" at their Gurugram plant. Initial reports suggest it's a hit with families needing that extra boot space for those long road trips to Rajasthan. Rumours say it's surprisingly fuel-efficient for its size!
normalised: Then, Maruti Suzuki finally launched the much-awaited "Jimny X L" at their Gurugram plant. Initial reports suggest it is a hit with families needing that extra boot space for those long road trips to Rajasthan. Rumours say it is surprisingly fuel-efficient for its size!

unnormalised: In electric news, Tata Motors is dropping hints about a souped-up Nexon EV with a bigger battery pack, potentially crossing the 500 km range mark. Dr. Sharma from ARAI gave it a thumbs up after testing!
normalised: In electric news, Tata Motors is dropping hints about a souped-up Nexon E V with a bigger battery pack, potentially crossing the five hundred kilometer range mark. Doctor Sharma from A R A I gave it a thumbs up after testing!

unnormalised: And lastly, Royal Enfield is teasing a new bike launch at India Bike Week in Goa. Speculation is rife - could it be the much-hyped Himalayan 450?
normalised: And lastly, Royal Enfield is teasing a new bike launch at India Bike Week in Goa. Speculation is rife - could it be the much-hyped Himalayan four hundred and fifty?

unnormalised: Bookings are already open for some, so get down to your nearest dealership. Expect prices ranging from Rs. 8 Lakh to upwards of Rs. 25 Lakh depending on the model and features. Plus, Maruti is opening up a new 10,000 sq ft showroom in Chandni Chowk! Happy driving!
normalised: Bookings are already open for some, so get down to your nearest dealership. Expect prices ranging from rupee eight lakh to upwards of rupee twenty five lakh depending on the model and features. Plus, Maruti is opening up a new ten thousand square feet showroom in Chandni Chowk! Happy driving!
